en.name: Tenacity of the Millelith
en.4p: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

zh.name: 千岩牢固
zh.4p: 元素战技命中敌人后，使队伍中附近的所有角色攻击力提升20%，护盾强效提升30%，持续3秒。该效果每0.5秒至多触发一次。装备此圣遗物套装的角色处于队伍后台时，依然能触发该效果。
